about_the_game:
[Game Type]
[DARK SUN] is an action game with 2D black and white graphics. It consists of Souls game + Castlevania style scenes.
Explore the world full of danger and malice in the game, collect weapons, magic, skills, and fight against enemies.

[Game Features]
Upgrade to gain skill points and personalize your fighting style. At certain locations, you can reset skill points and change your fighting style.
Some enemies are so powerful that you may experience multiple failures to defeat them. Or look for specific skills or magic which will make the battle easier.
You can carry multiple weapons with different skills and multiple magic spells. Use them in conjunction with each other to deal with various situations. Especially supporting magic and skills are very important.

Weapon skills are powerful attacks that consume magic and stamina and have high attack power.
It is important to use the right weapon skill when fighting powerful enemies.

Guns are handy weapons that have low attack power, but firing them when an enemy attacks will cause a counter effect.
Most enemies can be executed. Guns are great secondary weapons when you don't want to fight with magic.

Some scenarios require specific abilities to get through, look for these abilities to explore more places.
You will meet some NPCs in your exploration and helping them will allow you to learn about their story. At certain times they will also help you to challenge powerful enemies.
Hidden paths will contain idols related to boss abilities, breaking them will reduce the boss's abilities and also seal some of the boss's skills.
This will reduce the difficulty in fighting the bosses, but of course you can also challenge the high difficulty without breaking the idols.

[World Story]
The warm sun disappeared 1000 years ago and King Xena created a new sun, but the new sun was cold and dim.
Now that the world is near destruction, heroes from the past are summoned to the world 1000 years later to find the truth.
Each hero who comes to the end times must fulfill a mission that will change the fate of the world when all missions are completed.
Finding your own mission in the game and helping others fulfill theirs will affect the ending of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10 11
  • Processor: inter i3-10100 / amd 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 970 / amd 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10 11
  • Processor: inter i5-10600 / amd 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 1060 / amd 6600
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: [DARK SUN] is an action game with 2D black and white graphics. Souls game mode. Explore the post-apocalyptic world after a thousand years, collect weapons, armor, battle techniques, magic, and challenge powerful enemies. Advance through repeated deaths to find the truth of the doomsday.
